Config Module¶

class config.Config[source]¶

Bases: object

Configuration class for the Flask application.

SECRET_KEY¶

Secret key for securing sessions and tokens.

Type:

str

SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI¶

Database URI for SQLAlchemy.

Type:

str

SQLALCHEMY_TRACK_MODIFICATIONS¶

Flag to disable SQLAlchemy event system.

Type:

bool

JWT_SECRET_KEY¶

Secret key for encoding JWT tokens.

Type:

str

JWT_ALGORITHM¶

Algorithm used for JWT token encoding.

Type:

str

JWT_ALGORITHM = 'HS256'¶
JWT_SECRET_KEY = 'randomstring'¶
SECRET_KEY = 'supersecret'¶
SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI = 'sqlite:///customers.db'¶
SQLALCHEMY_TRACK_MODIFICATIONS = False¶
